verses.verse: And the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Mosheh <WH4872>, Yet will I bring <WH935> <WH8686> one <WH259> plague <WH5061> more upon Pharaoh <WH6547>, and upon Egypt <WH4714>; afterwards <WH310> he will let you go <WH7971> <WH8762> hence: when he shall let you go <WH7971> <WH8763>, he shall surely <WH1644> <WH8763> thrust you out <WH1644> <WH8762> hence altogether <WH3617>.

Speak <WH1696> <WH8761> now in the ears <WH241> of the people <WH5971>, and let every man <WH376> borrow <WH7592> <WH8799> of his neighbour <WH7453>, and every woman <WH802> of her neighbour <WH7468>, jewels <WH3627> of silver <WH3701>, and jewels <WH3627> of gold <WH2091>.

And the YY <WH3068> gave <WH5414> <WH8799> the people <WH5971> favour <WH2580> in the sight <WH5869> of the Egyptians <WH4714>. Moreover the man <WH376> Mosheh <WH4872> was very <WH3966> great <WH1419> in the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, in the sight <WH5869> of Pharaoh's <WH6547> servants <WH5650>, and in the sight <WH5869> of the people <WH5971>.
And Mosheh <WH4872> said <WH559> <WH8799>, Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068>, About midnight <WH3915> <WH2676> will I go out <WH3318> <WH8802> into the midst <WH8432> of Egypt <WH4714>:

And all the firstborn <WH1060> in the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> shall die <WH4191> <WH8804>, from the firstborn <WH1060> of Pharaoh <WH6547> that sitteth <WH3427> <WH8802> upon his throne <WH3678>, even unto the firstborn <WH1060> of the maidservant <WH8198> that is behind <WH310> the mill <WH7347>; and all the firstborn <WH1060> of beasts <WH929>.

And there shall be <WH1961> <WH8738> a great <WH1419> cry <WH6818> throughout all the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, such as there was none <WH3808> like it, nor <WH3808> shall be like it any more <WH3254> <WH8686>.

But against any of the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> shall not a dog <WH3611> move <WH2782> <WH8799> his tongue <WH3956>, against man <WH376> or beast <WH929>: that ye may know <WH3045> <WH8799> how that the YY <WH3068> doth put a difference <WH6395> <WH8686> between the Egyptians <WH4714> and Yisra'EL <WH3478>.

And all these thy servants <WH5650> shall come down <WH3381> <WH8804> unto me, and bow down <WH7812> <WH8694> themselves unto me, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Get thee out <WH3318> <WH8798>, and all the people <WH5971> that follow <WH7272> thee: and after <WH310> that I will go out <WH3318> <WH8799>. And he went out <WH3318> <WH8799> from Pharaoh <WH6547> in a great <WH2750> anger <WH639>.

And the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Mosheh <WH4872>, Pharaoh <WH6547> shall not hearken <WH8085> <WH8799> unto you; that my wonders <WH4159> may be multiplied <WH7235> <WH8800> in the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>.

And Mosheh <WH4872> and Aharon <WH175> did <WH6213> <WH8804> all these wonders <WH4159> before <WH6440> Pharaoh <WH6547>: and the YY <WH3068> hardened <WH2388> <WH8762> Pharaoh's <WH6547> heart <WH3820>, so that he would not let the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> go out <WH7971> <WH8765> of his land <WH776>.
